summary: A screenwriting teacher is forced to live out the plot of a screenplay idea he stole from a student, who now seeks revenge.
cast: Matthew Lillard|Deborah Kara Unger|Gina Holden|Serge Houde|Chiara Zanni|Michael Eklund|Xantha Radley|Ken Kramer|Brandon Jay McLaren|Woody Jeffreys|Ildiko Ferenczi|Paul Lazenby|Anna Galvin|Biski Gugushe|Parm Soor|Ben Cotton|David Orth|Patrick Gilmore|Courtney Vye|Brenda McDonald|Tom Braidwood|Ashleigh Gryzko|Mackenzie Gray|Olivia Cheng
title: Mensaje borrado
